<<<<<<< HEAD
To the never dying memory ... of his ever honor'd friend Mr. Michaell Sparke Iun. wounded by his unnaturall brother causelesly, whereof he dyed patiently, changing his mortall to immortality, Monday Novemb. 17, anno 1645. Vere, Thomas.
1 broadside : ill.
s.n., [London : 1645]
Sonnet; acrostic of Michael Sparke. Signed: Tho. Vere. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

1 broadside : ill.
s.n., [London : 1645]
Sonnet; acrostic of Michael Sparke. Signed: Tho. Vere. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
